name.zh: 日常斜挎邮差包（多颜色）

description.en: A lightweight everyday crossbody messenger designed for commuting and travel. Features a roomy main compartment, secure zipper closure, and adjustable shoulder strap for comfortable all-day carry. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便日常斜挎邮差包，适合通勤与旅行随身。主仓容量充足，拉链闭合更安全，肩带可调适合全天舒适背负。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：插扣/D 环/调节扣等（可定制）

en.Structure: Main compartment + internal organizer (optional) + back pocket (optional)
en.Use Case: Everyday commute, travel essentials, city carry
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 26–32cm × 高 18–22cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.结构: 主仓 + 内部收纳（可选）+ 背部口袋（可选）
zh.适用场景: 日常通勤、旅行随身收纳、城市轻出行
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
